title: The Blue Dejou
description: Can’t sleep? Who can nowadays? A drink brewed from the mysterious plant from the Arctic solves that problem. Escape into dreamland with the newest salted caramel flavor tonight! Can you resist it? Can Sid? He’s about to take a job at the local Blue Dejou and start a journey among some of the strangest and most dangerous people he’s ever met. People are different at night, but that’s okay, he’s never really fit in. From hobos to housewives, everyone needs their drink to sleep for different reasons. He’ll meet new friends but may have to lose some that are dear to him. One thing’s for sure, nothing will be the same once Sid takes his first sip of a joozoo latte.
author: Justin Lazaro
